China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 23 日星期五 05:58:57 GMT 120
Post-pandemic recovery fuels robust attendance - and hopes - at Singapore AirshowAs the bustling trade portion of first fully post-pandemic Singapore Airshow wound down on Friday, exhibitors and delegates said they were optimistic for the aviation industry despite suppliers' struggles to keep up with the rebound in travel demand. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:43:42 GMT BVVQ2UWV6BJSDHGAJ4EFBU2L6I https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/post-pandemic-recovery-fuels-robust-attendance-hopes-singapore-airshow-2024-02-23/Xinghui Kok商业航空航天与国防
China's "dragon" baby boom may boost population in 2024, report saysMore babies are being born in hospitals across China in the Year of the Dragon, financial news outlet Yicai reported, an increase which could soften the decline in population in 2024 and bring cheer to policymakers. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:08:46 GMT 46QRSODBDZN67CNWY2VVEKJ7IU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dragon-baby-boom-may-boost-population-2024-report-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中国
Argentina switch friendlies to US after China cancels matches amid Messi falloutArgentina will play two matches in the United States next month after Chinese sporting authorities cancelled friendlies featuring the World Cup champions amid a backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in an Inter Miami match in Hong Kong. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 04:43:30 GMT CRLOPDVXJZMJDCU7X64G4Y4CAM https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/argentina-switch-friendlies-us-after-china-cancels-matches-amid-messi-fallout-2024-02-23/Reuters运动的足球
StanChart announces $1 bln share buyback, dividend hike as 2023 profit rises 18%Standard Chartered PLC on Friday reported 2023 pre-tax profit rose 18%, in line with forecasts, and rewarded shareholders with a $1 billion share buyback and a jump in dividend. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 04:32:59 GMT OJZIJL46W5NF7BPMQXJBD2KRTM https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/stanchart-announces-1-bln-share-buyback-full-year-profit-rises-18-2024-02-23/Selena Li, Lawrence White市场交易
Several injured in 100-car pile-up on icy China expresswaySeveral people were injured after more than 100 cars collided into each other on an icy stretch of an expressway in the Chinese city of Suzhou, state media reported on Friday, the latest accident caused by extreme weather conditions. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 04:17:45 GMT FPDMEXD3DBLI3ASVZJN7LXUT3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/china/several-injured-100-car-pile-icy-china-expressway-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中国
Foreign debuts, but few defence deals at Singapore air showThe Singapore Airshow included the foreign debuts of new weapons systems, growing interest in systems that could destroy ballistic missiles and swat down drones - but it was missing any Russian presence and major defence deals were scarce. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 04:14:34 GMT OTOWJVHUIFMMPBOMA5JVV6OFJI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defence/foreign-debuts-few-defence-deals-singapore-air-show-2024-02-23/Gerry Doyle商业航空航天与国防
